description: Floor of n*phi^7, where phi is the golden ratio, A001622.
links: Karl V. Keller, Jr., Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (Python)from sympy import sqrtphi = (1 + sqrt(5))/2for n in range(0,101): print(int(n*phi**7), end=', ') # _Karl V. Keller, Jr._, Jul 22 2015(MAGMA) [Floor(n*((1 + Sqrt(5))/2)^7): n in [0..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 22 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
